thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Patrick Mac Manus
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Patrick Mac Manus

author: Patrick Mac Manus
title: Patrick Mac Manus
text:
Descriptions were clear, products are good brands, service super efficient, next day delivery with pre warnings from courier as to delivery slots. Products met my expectations. I even bought a pair of gym trainers on line which I would never normally do, but I was replicating my existing worn product/brand so took the risk and all is fine.
I'll be back!
